item.title: Comment on When is the right moment? by The Architect
item.dc:creator: The Architect
item.description: i liked the story, the motivation and i am really curious to see where this goes next. i am glad i was in the position to be a part of what you're doing. Thank you for the kind words! They are much, much appreciated :)
item.content:encoded: i liked the story, the motivation and i am really curious to see where this goes next. i am glad i was in the position to be a part of what you’re doing. Thank you for the kind words! They are much, much appreciated ðŸ™‚

item.title: Comment on When is the right moment? by Marketa Lexova
item.dc:creator: Marketa Lexova
item.description: Thank you very much for your support of the book Island and for such a great blog. It is a masterpiece!
item.content:encoded: Thank you very much for your support of the book Island and for such a great blog. It is a masterpiece!
